answers.answer: I was measuring a week ahead he wasn't worried until he did an ultrasound to confirm it and sure enough I was still a week ahead so he ended up switching my due date
I am 3 days ahead and 32w. Baby 4 lb till last week. I am worried about baby weight too. I do not know if it's normal at,this age or he is over weight
4lb is completely normal and healthy at 32 weeks! ^
Hoping they will switch the due date as I'm worried he's going to be huge if he stays in the extra 3 weeks.
Yeah 4lbs at 31 weeks seems like he's measuring bigger, you should ask next visit? Just to be safe wouldn't hurt to ask
Yes the thing is the due date I have now I'd only be 29 weeks and he's at 4 pounds. Hope everything is okay.

I went to my weekly doc visit on Wednesday and she messured me and said im messured 2 wks ahead i was 32 wk so i messured 34 and i have gestional diabetes so they want to do another ultrasound at 36 wks to check baby weight and i asked if hes big will they want to induce me and they said yes so if thats the case i would only have like 30 more days that makes me even more nervous i havent had a baby in 7 yrs and all my other kids have been induced so i know what that pain feels like ughhh

I hear you girl! My daughter is 4 and I was induced with her because the labor wasn't progressing fast enough. She came out 8 pounds 14 ounces. It worries me no matter what because either they won't induce and he will get huge and I would possibly need c-section or if they do induce I know it is super painful and intense. I don't want him here too early but I also don't want a baby that is too large and not healthy..
My appointment this past week they told me mine is measuring big too, but not big enough to order ultrasound.  Yet LOL.  My first baby was over 9lb!!

question: Had doctor visit yesterday and my doctor said she would like a dating ultrasound done because he's measuring big. Went in for the ultrasound and was told he's 17 days ahead of edd. So suppose to be 29 weeks and she said measuring at 31 weeks and 5 days. She also informed me he is 4 pounds. Just wondering if anyone can relate or have any thoughts? Won't see my doctor for another two weeks..
title: baby measuring big
